TopicTitle: Solution procedural parts and RFSRB loading issue

Articles.Content:
It took me quite a long time to figure out how to get my RO install working, after ckan did several updates...

Here is my solution worked on my Install and so on.. use at own risk ;-)

The loading screen freezed on loading procedural parts\zothermods\RFSRB.cfg....

Solution: download solverengine ver.1.14 and overwrite existing files in your gamedata folder

This worked for me today...

 

Good luck !!!

It's my fault. I was supposed to release RF last night but did not. I am doing so ASAP.

 

EDIT: released.
